short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Searches Google in a new tab for the selected text in current page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you select a text in a tab, you can google for it by right clicking the selection and choosing Search Google for... 
This extension creates a button for this functionality. 
You select text in a tab, and press the button. A new tab is opened and a google search for the selected text is performed.
